Unable to display webpage.

Your mobile device is not connected to the network. Follow the links below to find out more about possible solutions.

  • Check network status
  • Connect to mobile network
  • Connect to Wi-Fi network
  • Check SIM card

    • Check network status

    To connect to the internet, your device must be within range of the mobile network or connected to Wi-Fi. The status bar provides info such as the device's signal strength and connection status.

    Connect to mobile network

    To connect via your mobile network, Mobile data must be turned on.

    On your phone, go to Settings > Connections tab > More networks > Mobile networks, and turn on Mobile data.

    On your tablet, go to Settings > More settings > Mobile networks, and turn on Mobile data.

    Connect to Wi-Fi network

    To connect via a Wi-Fi network, Wi-Fi must be turned on.

    On your phone, go to Settings > Connections and turn on Wi-Fi. Then select a wireless network to connect to.

    On your tablet, go to Settings and turn on Wi-Fi. Then select a wireless network to connect to.

    Check SIM card

    If your SIM card is not inserted correctly, your device will not be able to connect to your mobile network.

    Remove the back cover, then pull out the battery and the SIM card. Re-insert the SIM card, making sure that the gold-colored contact is facing down. Push the SIM card firmly into the slot until it locks in place.
